WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
i have Problems with importing a Certificate for the use with WPP/WSUS. I have generated a Certificate with the same attributes then the self-signed Cert, but WPP will not import this PFX-File and gives only a failure Message "Failed to load the certificate - Check the File". Import of the same pfx-file directly in the Certification-store with MMC works without failures.
WorkItem.Summary: Import of Certificate does not work
